title: Happy Hippo, Angry Duck
description: Bestselling author Sandra Boynton’s board book tackles the concept of moods with her charming, trademark sense of humor.Clever animals exemplify a wide range of emotions in this hilarious story about different feelings. Young readers are sure to giggle as interactive text asks them if they are grumpy as a moose or excited as a dog? Maybe they're worried as a rabbit or contented as a frog?Are you HAPPY AS A HIPPO?Or ANGRY AS A DUCK?Maybe SAD AS A CHICKEN?(Can you sadly say “CLUCK CLUCK”?)
author: Sandra Boynton
